version_description:
• New levels 6-10 added for Irresponsible Dad
• Fixed a bug that might cause a crash when the app enters the background
• Fixed collision values in some shapes in the editor
• Fixed the background selector in the editor

• New levels 11-15 added for Irresponsible Dad
• Passing 8 or more levels in chapters 1 or 2 will unlock an All Characters level
• Fixed a bug in the editor that caused "hide vehicle" to default to the off setting
• Fixed a bug in Irresponsible Dad's level 9 which might cause a button to be difficult to press

• New levels 1-5 added for Wheelchair Guy
• The option to remove blood as been added to the Options > Advanced Options menu
• Tapping the page indicator in the chapter select will quickly navigate you to that chapter
• Minor changes and bug fixes
• New levels 6-10 added for Wheelchair Guy
• New levels 11-15 added for Wheelchair Guy
New levels 11-15 for Effective Shopper! Warning, they are very difficult.
Levels 1 - 5 have been added for Effective Shopper. Finish all 5 and unlock 1 level for all the characters.
New levels 11-15 for Effective Shopper! Warning, they are very difficult.

• 3 new levels for Pogo Stick Man
• Full screen support for iPhone X and up
• Pogo stick controls improved
• Business Guy won't sustain random injury when idling
• Shorter wait times when ads don't load
• Minor changes
